name: Dagnabbit (Michael Grieshofer, DrManatee)
description:
Description:

You got yerself tied to yer horse, ya ninny! Use yer mistake to yey advantage and slingshot all over the god darn place!

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys - Move

Space / W / Up - Jump

Shift / F - Pick up horse / Slingshot to horse

Credits:

Programming / Map art - Michael Grieshofer

Art - DrManatee

Nickitus
